name: Balloon and Cactus: A Love Story
name_original: Balloon and Cactus: A Love Story
description:
How long can you help Balloon survive in the thorniest of relationships? 

Inflated list of features:

  • Carefully float Balloon into hugs while avoiding the deadly arms of Cactus!
  • Avoid the ever-closing walls of Cactus's crush!
  • Mumble puns about balloons and cacti nobody will hear!

Balloon and Cactus was built with TIC-80 as an example for a teens' game-making work shop at Fort Vancouver Regional Library!
